description: Jan Hein Hoogstad, alias Yeehaa, is a seasoned strategist and consultant excelling in business development and innovation. He authored 'Align the Misaligned,' discussing the fragmentation of digital space and curated a course on aligning personal and professional goals.
blurb: Jan Hein Hoogstad, a.k.a. Yeehaa, leverages his business development and digital transformation experience for organizational success. Passionate about innovation, he provides expert strategies for improved performance and growth.
